issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
{html}

TiMobile sdk version 1.5.0.8f4eea3 ipod touch 4GT (4.2.1)

worked in 1.4.2, not sure the break build for 1.5.0

1.Phone > Sound > Record
2.check the value for audio line type

results: "unknown" should be "mic" though in 1.4.2 it said "speaker" which seems wrong as well… so maybe this never reported back the correct value?

{html}
fields.summary: iOS:  iPod touch, audio line type is returned as "unknown" when using the mic to record

comments.body:
Tested on an iPhone 3GS using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120821095711, unable to reproduce the issue. It says 'receiver/mic' as the type.

Ticket marked as resolved.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
